{
    "common": {
        "condition": "is_dict",
        "value": {
            "common.follow": {
                "condition": "added",
                "value": false
            },
            "common.setting1": {
                "condition": "related",
                "value": "Value 1"
            },
            "common.setting2": {
                "condition": "removed",
                "value": 200
            },
            "common.setting3": {
                "condition": "changed_new",
                "value": null
            },
            "common.setting4": {
                "condition": "added",
                "value": "blah blah"
            },
            "common.setting5": {
                "condition": "added",
                "value": {
                    "key5": "value5"
                }
            },
            "common.setting6": {
                "condition": "is_dict",
                "value": {
                    "common.setting6.doge": {
                        "condition": "is_dict",
                        "value": {
                            "common.setting6.doge.wow": {
                                "condition": "changed_new",
                                "value": "so much"
                            }
                        }
                    },
                    "common.setting6.key": {
                        "condition": "related",
                        "value": "value"
                    },
                    "common.setting6.ops": {
                        "condition": "added",
                        "value": "vops"
                    }
                }
            }
        }
    },
    "group1": {
        "condition": "is_dict",
        "value": {
            "group1.baz": {
                "condition": "changed_new",
                "value": "bars"
            },
            "group1.foo": {
                "condition": "related",
                "value": "bar"
            },
            "group1.nest": {
                "condition": "changed_new",
                "value": "str"
            }
        }
    },
    "group2": {
        "condition": "removed",
        "value": {
            "abc": 12345,
            "deep": {
                "id": 45
            }
        }
    },
    "group3": {
        "condition": "added",
        "value": {
            "deep": {
                "id": {
                    "number": 45
                }
            },
            "fee": 100500
        }
    }
}
